meanings.definition: A person or thing that is preferred above others.
meanings.sent1: My cat is one of my favorites because she always cuddles with me.
meanings.sent2: I have many favorites, but my favorite color is blue.
meanings.sent3: At the pet store, the parrot joked that he was everyone's favorite bird.
meanings.sent4: The sunflower stood out in the field, a favorite among the other flowers.
meanings.sent5: The cozy blanket quickly became my favorite on chilly nights.

meanings.definition: A list of preferred items or choices.
meanings.sent1: I keep a list of favorites on my phone for easy access.
meanings.sent2: Her favorites include ice cream, pizza, and watching movies.
meanings.sent3: The grocery store's favorites section always tempts me with new snacks.
meanings.sent4: The library's favorites shelf held all the popular books of the year.
meanings.sent5: His favorites list grew longer as he discovered new songs to enjoy.

meanings.sent1: I always favorites the songs I like on my music app.
meanings.sent2: She favorites all the best recipes in her cookbook.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally favorites his own tweet while scrolling through Twitter.
meanings.sent4: The artist favorites the colors she plans to use in her next painting.
meanings.sent5: Remember to favorites the important emails so you can find them easily later.
